ssa-survivor-benefits-child-disabled.tit: Survivors Benefits for Child with Disabilities
ssa-survivor-benefits-child-disabled.hea: Survivors Benefits for Child with Disabilities
ssa-survivor-benefits-child-disabled.sum: Social Security survivors benefits are paid to a child, stepchild, grandchild, or adopted child of eligible workers.
ssa-survivor-benefits-child-disabled.eli: You are at least 18 years old.
